title: Convenient Germany Mercure Escape near Munich Airport & Bavarian Old Town with Fitness Centre & Sauna
description:
Touchdown at Mercure Hotel München Airport Freising, a stylish retreat just minutes from Munich International Airport. Whether you're flying in for business or kicking off a Bavarian adventure, this stylish hotel offers a comfortable base with modern rooms designed for restful layovers and leisurely stays alike.

Ideally located between the picture-perfect town of Freising and Munich’s busy centre, this hotel offers the best of both worlds. Explore Freising's medieval cathedral and Bavarian old town just minutes away, or board a train to explore Munich's famous Marienplatz and Oktoberfest grounds. Beer enthusiasts will love the world's oldest brewery, Weihenstephan, just a short drive away.
offer_address: Dr von Daller Street 1-3, Freising 85356, Germany
